name: Citrus Soap
description:
100% Vegan Organic Handmade Soap

Refreshing and uplifting, you will love the fresh clean smell of citrus.  Not only is it great for waking you up in the morning, it helps you to relax and reduce depression.  Citrus is perfect for soothing dry, irritated, and acne prone skin while while healing and evening out skin tone.  Your skin will feel renewed and refreshed after every use.

Distilled water, organic refined white shea butter, organic virgin coconut oil, organic olive oil, safflower oil, sodium hydroxide*,  castor oil, sunflower oil, organic aloe vera juice, organic essential oil blend, annatto seeds (for color), vitamin E.

*None remains after saponification.  Real soap can only be made with sodium hydroxide.

Approximate Weight 4.5oz.

All soaps are handmade size and appearance may vary.

The statements on this website have not been evaluated by the FDA.

name: Lavender Soap
description:
100% Vegan Organic Handmade Soap

Soothing and moisturizing with the lovely scent of Lavender.  With real lavender buds your sure to feel relaxed and pampered.  Lavender is known for being calming and therapeutic, great for after a long day or just before bed.   

Distilled water, organically refined white shea butter, organic virgin coconut oil, organic ethically sourced palm oil, safflower oil, sodium hydroxide*, castor oil, sweet almond oil, apricot kernel oil, organic aloe vera juice, organic lavender buds, organic lavender essential oil, vitamin E.

*None remains after saponification.  Real soap can only be made with sodium hydroxide.

Approximate weight 4.5oz.

All bars are handmade, size and appearance may vary.

The statements on this website have not been evaluated by the FDA.

name: Mocha Latte Soap
description:
100% Vegan Organic Handmade Soap

This caffeinated soap is made with Cocoa Butter and fresh brewed coffee. In addition to helping get you up in the morning, caffeine helps to revive the skin and makes it feel healthy and fresh.  Cocoa Butter is packed with antioxidants, which help fight aging while offering protection and hydration. 

Organic brewed coffee (distilled water), organically refined white shea butter, organic virgin coconut oil, organic olive oil, safflower oil, sodium hydroxide*, organic cocoa butter, castor oil, organic coffee grounds, raw organic cacao powder, vitamin E.

This soap is made with Death Wish Coffee; it's organic, shade grown, fair trade, and it's the world's most caffeinated coffee! Available at Saratoga Coffee Traders.

*None remains after saponification.  Real soap can only be made with sodium hydroxide.

Approximate weight 4.5oz.  

All bars are handmade and cut by hand size and appearance may vary

This bar contains finely ground coffee beans and may not be suitable for sensitive skin.  Spot testing is recommended.

The statements on this website have not been evaluated by the FDA.

name: Lavender Orange Vanilla Soap
description:
100% Vegan Organic Handmade Soap

Our signature scent, you are sure to love this unique soap.  Rich vanilla, soothing lavender, and fresh orange come together in a unique combination that is sweet, floral, and fresh. This soap is sure to excite your senses! And with tons of moisturizing skin loving oils and butters it's great to help relieve dry, itchy, and irritated skin.

Distilled water, organic refined white shea butter, organic virgin coconut oil, organic olive oil, safflower oil, sodium hydroxide*, organic ethically sourced palm oil, castor oil, organic essential oil blend, vitamin E.

name: Green Tea Soap
description:
100% Vegan Organic Handmade Soap

Refreshing and invigorating, this soap is made with fresh brewed green tea.  Eucalyptus, rosemary, lemon, and tea tree essential oils create an incredible fresh scent you'll love as well as being gentle and incredibly moisturizing. It has a refreshing and cooling sensation that's great for almost any skin type; it's a great soap for those with sensitive or irritated skin.


Organic green tea (distilled water), organic refined white shea butter, organic virgin coconut oil, safflower oil, organic ethically sourced palm oil, sodium hydroxide*, sweet almond oil, castor oil, organic lemon essential oil, organic essential oil blend, vitamin E.

description:
100% Vegan Organic Handmade Soap

Moisturizing bar made with Cocoa Butter.  It has a wonderfully rich and decadent smell of chocolate you will love.  Naturally high in Vitamin E, antioxidants, and minerals your skin will feel rejuvenated and pampered after every use.  Rich in antioxidants it fights pre-mature aging and protects the skin.  Cocoa Butter keeps your skin hydrated while improving collagen and elastin production.  

Distilled water, organic cocoa butter, organically refined white shea butter, organic virgin coconut oil, safflower oil, sunflower oil, sodium hydroxide*, castor oil, raw organic cacao powder, vitamin E.

name: Colloidal Oatmeal & Aloe Soap
description:
100% Vegan Organic Handmade Soap

Made with soothing aloe vera juice and colloidal oatmeal, it's great for sensitive, irritated, and sunburnt skin.  This soap is gentle, moisturizing and unscented.  Aloe vera is an excellent moisturizer its full of antioxidants and boosts the skin cell renewal process.  Colloidal Oatmeal is a soothing agent commonly used to help dry, rough, and/or scaly skin while returning skin to it's natural moisture balance.  Colloidal Oatmeal is often used to help relieve symptoms eczema, dermatitis, or psoriasis.    

Organic aloe vera juice, organic refined white shea butter, organic virgin coconut oil, safflower oil, organic olive oil, sodium hydroxide*, sweet almond oil, castor oil, colloidal oatmeal, jojoba oil, vitamin E.

*None remains after saponification.  Real soap can only be made with sodium hydroxide.

The statements on this website have not been evaluated by the FDA.

Peppermint is great for headaches, alleviating stress, relieving muscle pain, and improving poor circulation.  Rosemary is great for dry and acne prone skin, it can reduce the appearance of broken capillaries and varicose veins, and helps heal burns and wounds.

name: Green Tea Body Butter
description:
100% Vegan Organic Handmade Body Butter

Refreshing, and invigorating this body butter is full of wonderful ingredients that are moisturizing, rich in antioxidants and other great skin benefits.  Eucalyptus, rosemary, lemon, and tea tree create an incredible fresh scent you'll love.  You will feel refreshed while enjoying the benefits of this awesome body butter.  It's great for almost any skin type from acne prone, sensitive, dry, irritated, to mature while being moisturizing, refreshing, and cooling.

Organically refined white shea butter, organic green tea (distilled water), safflower oil, sweet almond oil, apricot kernel oil, jojoba oil, organic organic lemon essential oil, organic eucalyptus essential oil, organic rosemary essential oil, organic tea tree essential oil, organic guar gum, vitamin E.

name: Cocoa Butter Body Butter
description:
100% Vegan Organic Handmade Body Butter

Moisturizing body butter made with Cocoa Butter which is naturally rich in vitamin E as well as other vitamins and minerals it improves skins elasticity and moisture retention.  Rich in antioxidants it fights free radicals which fight pre-mature aging and protects the skin from the sun's harmful UV rays.  Cocoa Butter keeps your skin hydrated while improving collagen and elastin production.  

Organically refined white shea butter, distilled water, organic cocoa butter, safflower oil, sweet almond oil, apricot kernel oil, jojoba oil, organic cacao powder, organic guar gum, vitamin E.

Body butters are very thick and a little goes a long way.  Great soothing for dry, itchy or irritated skin.

Refined White Shea Butter is an all natural vitamin A cream. Shea Butter has shown to be a excellent moisturizer, with exceptional healing properties for the skin. It is known to help even skin tone while reducing blemishes and scarring.

Cocoa Butter contains fatty acids, which improve skin moisture retention and elasticity. Rich in antioxidants it helps in fighting off free radicals. Protects the skin from the harmful effects of the sun's UV rays.

Sweet almond oil softens and re-conditions skin, soothes inflammation and calms irritation, particularly eczema, psoriasis and dry skin.

Jojoba oil is rich in protein, minerals and vitamin E and has components similar to skin’s sebum, or naturally occurring oils, making it very useful for acneic and oily skin types. Jojoba oil is especially recommended for skin that is dry, psoriasis, eczema, sunburn and rash, due to its ‘balancing’ properties

Vitamin E Oil heals and prevents against scarring. Helps to protects skin cells from ultraviolet light, pollution, other elements that produce cell damage. Can help provide a youthful renewed appearance in aging and damaged skin.

The statements on this website have not been evaluated by the FDA.
